file_content.text: This can't be happening.
Wait! Please, don't hurt me!
They made us fire the satellites! Mena and the others refused... and then the mercs put a blaster in my face! I--I couldn't say no.
Be quiet and accept a coward's death.
Silence. [Draw lightsaber]
No! Please, I can still be of use!
Grovel, and I'll make this quick.
Bow to me. [Draw lightsaber]
Wait, please, oh glorious master Sith! Let me serve you!
Too bad I can't thank those mercs for doing the heavy lifting.
Easy pickings. [Draw blaster]
Whoa, wait, let's--let's make a deal.
Shh.
It's over. [Draw blaster]
Wait! Please, I can help you. Like I helped them!
You were destroying targets on Makeb. What were they?
What were you firing on?
Evacuation transports... civilians. On Hutt orders.
Those foul slugs gorged themselves on Makeb. Now the Hutts're fleeing... but they can't outrun the Sky Lancers.
You're free to go. We're only here to make sure nobody uses these satellites again.
I'm not going to kill you.
Thank you, that's--wait. You can't destroy the satellites!
The Hutts are fleeing Makeb, right? But the Sky Lancers can shoot their transports out of the sky!
Two minutes. Please. That's all I need to engage the satellites and make those Hutts pay for what they did to my planet.
Fine. Kill the Hutts.
Burn those slugs to the ground.
Sear the Hutts with your fury, and savor your revenge.
What are you waiting for? I can never pass up a Hutt roast.
You have one minute. Destroy the Hutts, quickly.
Thank you!
The Hutts are on the move. Acquiring targets....
Satellites two through seven locked. Engaging in three... two... one... fire!
All targets destroyed. They're dead, Mena. The Hutts are dead.
That will give the Archon something to think about.
Good work. [Kill him]
The mercenaries will be here soon.
It's over. [Destroy controls]
Head for the safety of Gravity Hook Seven. Tell Katha Niar I sent you.
Of course. Th--thank you!
Vengeance doesn't suit you.
Run. [Destroy controls]
Get to safety while you still can.
Goodbye, Mena. I'm sorry....
Sergeant Bedareux. The Sky Lancer satellites are out of commission.
Fantastic! Your mission to save Makeb is cleared to proceed. Katha Niar sends her thanks.
Good luck, and a quick victory to you. That isotope-5 is almost ours.
